title: Normal Matchmaking System vs Ranked
body: When will, if ever, the new matchmaking system migrate to normal queue? I think we can safely say that the new matchmaking is a success and after having it so good with ranked it seems even worse having to fight for your lane in chat for normals.

replies.body: Draft pick again you say? Takes too long for you to get in. That's probably one of the main reasons.
If history is any indication not for a long time. Especially on this server.
